alert.note: Alert for Coastal Kleberg; Coastal Nueces; Inland Kleberg; Inland Nueces (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Excessive Heat Warning issued July 16 at 3:46PM CDT until July 16 at 6:00PM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...EXCESSIVE HEAT WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM CDT THIS EVENING... ...HEAT ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM CDT THIS EVENING... ...HEAT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM NOON TO 7 PM CDT MONDAY... * WHAT...For the Excessive Heat Warning, dangerously hot conditions with heat index values up to 123. For the first Heat Advisory, heat index values up to 114 expected. For the second Heat Advisory, heat index values up to 114 expected. * WHERE...Inland Kleberg, Inland Nueces, Coastal Kleberg and Coastal Nueces Counties. * WHEN...For the Excessive Heat Warning, until 6 PM CDT this evening. For the first Heat Advisory, until 8 PM CDT this evening. For the second Heat Advisory, from noon to 7 PM CDT Monday. * IMPACTS...Extreme heat and humidity will significantly increase the potential for heat related illnesses, particularly for those working or participating in outdoor activities.
info.instruction: Drink plenty of fluids, stay in an air-conditioned room, stay out of the sun, and check up on relatives and neighbors. Young children and pets should never be left unattended in vehicles under any circumstances. Take extra precautions if you work or spend time outside. When possible reschedule strenuous activities to early morning or evening. Know the signs and symptoms of heat exhaustion and heat stroke. Wear lightweight and loose fitting clothing when possible. To reduce risk during outdoor work, the Occupational Safety and Health Administration recommends scheduling frequent rest breaks in shaded or air conditioned environments. Anyone overcome by heat should be moved to a cool and shaded location. Heat stroke is an emergency! Call 9 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Kleberg; Coastal Nueces; Inland Kleberg; Inland Nueces
